chapters.title: Chapter 3: Hill of the Golden Dawn
chapters.info: King Galldrian su Riatin Rie, p. 97 (113)—Late King of Cairhien. He assumed the throne after House Damodred lost the throne in the Aiel War because of Laman's Sin. His assassination precipitated the civil war in Cairhien; all of the nobles fought with each other over Galldrian's kingdom, and ended up destroying it in the process.
